resources.string: Hi! My name is MailBot and I am here to deliver your letters or your parcels to anyone in the EEE building!\n\nChoose what type of mail item you want to deliver to start organising your delivery!

Thank you for giving me your mail! It will be delivered in the next delivery slot time, and a confirmation e-mail with the security code for the recipient to open the locker has been sent to both you and the recipient.
All lockers of this size are full
That\'s great! I just need to know a little bit about you...
